items.content_html: Snake Game is a classic arcade-style game built purely with JavaScript. Players control a snake that moves around the screen, eating food to grow longer while avoiding collisions with walls or its own body. The game features smooth controls, real-time gameplay, and is implemented with just JavaScript for a lightweight, framework-free experience.
items.title: satyam-4/Snake-Game:  Snake Game is a classic arcade-style game built purely with JavaScript. Players control a snake that moves around the screen, eating food to grow longer while avoiding collisions with walls or its own body. The game features smooth controls, real-time gameplay, and is implemented with just JavaScript for a lightweight, framework-free experience.
